Monster.Name: Aarakocra
Monster.Description: A race of bird-like, monstrous humanoids dwelling in high mountains.

Monster.Name: Aboleth
Monster.Description: A race of malevolent, eel-like aberrations with potent psionic abilities.

Monster.Name: Allosaurus
Monster.Description: A large, bipedal, carnivorous, theropod dinosaur.

Monster.Name: Androsphinx
Monster.Description: A sphinx with the head of a man.

Monster.Name: Animated Armor
Monster.Description: Armor that has been animated by external forces.

Monster.Name: Ankheg
Monster.Description: A huge insectoid monster with many slender limbs and large antennae.

Monster.Name: Ankylosaurus
Monster.Description: A heavily built quadrupedal herbivorous dinosaur, armored with bony plates.

Monster.Name: Ape
Monster.Description: A large primate that lacks a tail.

Monster.Name: Arcanaloth
Monster.Description: A record keeper for yugoloths who resembles a robed human with the head of a fanged jackal or war dog.

Monster.Name: Azer
Monster.Description: An elemental creature native to the Elemental Plane of Fire and Elemental Chaos, created by fire titans and fire giants, whom they often served.

Monster.Name: Baboon
Monster.Description: A large, ground-dwelling monkey with a long doglike snout, large teeth, and naked callosities on the buttocks.

Monster.Name: Badger
Monster.Description: A heavily built omnivorous nocturnal mammal of the weasel family, typically having a gray and black coat.

Monster.Name: Balor
Monster.Description: One of the most powerful types of tanar'ri demons, second in power only to the demon lords, klurichirs, and myrmyxicus.

Monster.Name: Banshee
Monster.Description: A female undead phantom, a selfish, strong-willed spirit that embodied the essence of hideousness.

Monster.Name: Barlgura
Monster.Description: A large demon fiend that has reddish-brown hair and stands between 5 and 6 feet tall, similar to orangutans.

Monster.Name: Basilisk
Monster.Description: A large, eight-legged reptile with the terrifying ability to poison or petrify their prey.

Monster.Name: Bat
Monster.Description: A mainly nocturnal mammal capable of sustained flight, with membranous wings that extend between the fingers and connecting the forelimbs to the body and the hindlimbs to the tail.

Monster.Name: Behir
Monster.Description: A great serpentine monster with twelve legs and an electrical breath.

Monster.Name: Beholder
Monster.Description: A floating orb of flesh with a large mouth, single central eye, and many smaller eyestalks on top with powerful magical abilities.

Monster.Name: Boar
Monster.Description: A tusked, wild pig from which domestic pigs are descended.

Monster.Name: Bugbear
Monster.Description: A massive humanoid distantly related to goblins and hobgoblins.

Monster.Name: Bulette
Monster.Description: A huge ravenous creature that burrows through the earth and attacks unsuspecting victims from below.

Monster.Name: Bullywug
Monster.Description: A froglike humanoid creatures.

Monster.Name: Cambion
Monster.Description: A humanoid creature that is half-fiend and the result of breeding a devil with mortals.

Monster.Name: Camel
Monster.Description: A large, long-necked ungulate mammal of arid country, with long slender legs, broad cushioned feet, and either one or two humps on the back. Camels can survive for long periods without food or drink, chiefly by using up the fat reserves in their humps.

Monster.Name: Cat
Monster.Description: A small domesticated carnivorous mammal with soft fur, a short snout, and retractile claws. It is widely kept as a pet or for catching mice, and many breeds have been developed.

Monster.Name: Centaur
Monster.Description: A creature with the head, arms, and torso of a man and the body and legs of a horse.

Monster.Name: Chasme
Monster.Description: A type of tanar'ri demon found in the Abyss. They are horrid and disgusting hybrids of flies and humans who sucked blood and enjoyed tormenting and torturing their victims.

Monster.Name: Chimera
Monster.Description: A large, magical female monster with a lion's head, a goat's body, and a serpent's tail.

Monster.Name: Chuul
Monster.Description: A large lobster-like aberration with a hatred for surface-dwelling humanoids.

Monster.Name: Cloaker
Monster.Description: A monster able to disguise its body to resemble a cloak when at rest. The cloaker pacifies victims with an eerie moan, and engulfs its prey within its body to help it eat the prey.

Monster.Name: Cockatrice
Monster.Description: A small avian magical beast whose bites can turn its prey to stone permanently.

Monster.Name: Couatl
Monster.Description: A large serpentine creature that is a native outsider.

Monster.Name: Crab
Monster.Description: A crustacean with a broad carapace, stalked eyes, and five pairs of legs, the first pair of which are modified as pincers.

Monster.Name: Crocodile
Monster.Description: A large predatory semiaquatic reptile with long jaws, long tail, short legs, and a horny textured skin, using submersion and stealth to approach prey unseen.

Monster.Name: Cyclops
Monster.Description: A member of a race of savage one-eyed giants.

Monster.Name: Dao
Monster.Description: A variation of genie from the Elemental Plane of Earth.

Monster.Name: Deer
Monster.Description: A hoofed grazing or browsing animal, with branched bony antlers that are shed annually and typically borne only by the male.

Monster.Name: Demilich
Monster.Description: A lich who had evolved beyond a need for its undead body.

Monster.Name: Derro
Monster.Description: A species of monstrous humanoids that inhabited the Underdark.

Monster.Name: Deva
Monster.Description: A kind of angel, or aasimon that resemble human-like men and women of extraordinary beauty or handsomeness with two magnificent feathered wings emerging from their shoulders.

Monster.Name: Djinni
Monster.Description: A creature born from the Elemental Chaos that resembles a ten and a half feet human man or woman, well-muscled and physically fit, considered attractive by human standards with their skin tone ranging from pale blue to a more common olive-brown.

Monster.Name: Doppelganger
Monster.Description: A tall, elven, gray-skinned humanoid who has a thin body with human eyes and appears sexless. They have shapeshifting abilities that allow them to mimic almost any humanoid creature.

Monster.Name: Dretch
Monster.Description: An ape-like creature with arms ending in clawed hands. They are the least powerful of the tanar'ri demonkind.

Monster.Name: Drider
Monster.Description: A drow that has transformed from the waist down so that they have the body of a spider.

Monster.Name: Drow
Monster.Description: A dark-skinned sub-race of elves that predominantly lived in the Underdark.

Monster.Name: Dryad
Monster.Description: A fey-maiden who acts as a protector of forests and trees that resembles a beautiful woman with delicate features seemingly made of soft wood with hair made of leaves and foliage.

Monster.Name: Duergar
Monster.Description: A subterranean race that appears to be a typically bald, stocky figure with dull gray skin and hair.

Monster.Name: Duodrone
Monster.Description: A block-shaped construct capable of two tasks at a time.

Monster.Name: Eagle
Monster.Description: A large bird of prey with a massive hooked bill and long broad wings, renowned for its keen sight and powerful soaring flight.

Monster.Name: Efreeti
Monster.Description: A tall, muscular humanoid with fiery forms and spectacular magical powers. They are unpredictable creatures.

Monster.Name: Elephant
Monster.Description: A heavy plant-eating mammal with a prehensile trunk, long curved ivory tusks, and large ears.

Monster.Name: Elk
Monster.Description: A red deer of a large race.

Monster.Name: Empyrean
Monster.Description: A humanoid race that are the children of the gods of the upper planes.

Monster.Name: Erinyes
Monster.Description: A humanoid that resembles a beautiful woman or man, with large feathered wings and glowing red eyes, could be mistaken for a celestial.

Monster.Name: Ettercap
Monster.Description: A race of bestial spider-men aberrations located throughout Faerûn that resemble a hunched, grey-purplish humanoids with distended white underbellies, spider-like faces, and two sharp, black chitinous claws instead of hands and feet.

Monster.Name: Ettin
Monster.Description: A giant with two heads that were capable of independent thought and can each control one arm for attacking.

Monster.Name: Flameskull
Monster.Description: An undead sentry fashioned from the skulls of dead spellcasters that are covered in a green flame.

Monster.Name: Flumph
Monster.Description: A mysterious and benevolent creature that floats through the Underdark using an innate anti-gravity field and move by using air jets as propulsion.

Monster.Name: Fomorian
Monster.Description: A hideously deformed and misshapen giant.

Monster.Name: Frog
Monster.Description: A tailless amphibian with a short squat body, moist smooth skin, and very long hind legs for leaping.

Monster.Name: Gargoyle
Monster.Description: A large predator which resembles a winged statue of a demon-like humanoid whose hide is rough and thick, similar to stone.

Monster.Name: Ghast
Monster.Description: A subtype of ghoul that is a bit more slender and ghost-like.

Monster.Name: Ghost
Monster.Description: A spirit of a deceased sentient creature.

Monster.Name: Ghoul
Monster.Description: A monstrous, emaciated humanoid creature with putrid grey skin that reeks of carrion.

Monster.Name: Glabrezu
Monster.Description: A powerful type of tanar'ri demon that has a giant, broad, muscular body with two pairs of arms: the small set being humanoid ending in hands while the other set was monstrous and ended in a pair of crab-like pincers.

Monster.Name: Gnoll
Monster.Description: A humanoid race that most closely resemble human-hyena hybrids within Faerûn.

Monster.Name: Goat
Monster.Description: A hardy domesticated ruminant animal that has backward curving horns and (in the male) a beard.

Monster.Name: Goblin
Monster.Description: A small goblinoid common throughout Toril that has a flat face, broad nose, pointed ears, and small, sharp fangs with their forehead sloped back and their eyes being any color from red to yellow.

Monster.Name: Gorgon
Monster.Description: A large magical beast that resembles a bull, covered in dusky metallic scales.

Monster.Name: Goristro
Monster.Description: A powerful type of tanar'ri demon that resembles huge fiendish minotaurs and have horns like a bull.

Monster.Name: Grell
Monster.Description: A sightless aberration that resembles a giant floating brain with tentacles and a beak.

Monster.Name: Grick
Monster.Description: An abberation that resembles a large, darkly colored worm or snake-like creature.

Monster.Name: Griffon
Monster.Description: An intelligent beast with the body of a lion and the wings, forelegs, and head of an eagle.

Monster.Name: Grimlock
Monster.Description: A blind, monstrous humanoid that lives in the Underdark and has slightly scaled, gray skin.

Monster.Name: Gynosphinx
Monster.Description: A female sphinx.

Monster.Name: Harpy
Monster.Description: A malign humanoid creature with an avian lower body and a pair of wings.

Monster.Name: Hawk
Monster.Description: A diurnal bird of prey with broad rounded wings and a long tail, typically taking prey by surprise with a short chase.

Monster.Name: Hezrou
Monster.Description: A type of tanar'ri demon that is a large demonic monstrosity that bares a superficial resemblance to a toad in humanoid form, with arms and hands instead of forelegs and a wide maw with rows of blunt teeth.

Monster.Name: Hippogriff
Monster.Description: A chimeric magical beast related to griffons who has the body of a horse, with the wings and head of a hawk or eagle.

Monster.Name: Hobgoblin
Monster.Description: A larger, stronger, smarter, and more menacing form of goblinoids than goblins.

Monster.Name: Homunculus
Monster.Description: A tiny construct created by a spellcaster to act as a spy and/or servant who resembles a winged humanoid creatures, similar to gargoyles or tiny demons.

Monster.Name: Hydra
Monster.Description: A large, reptilian magical beast that has anywhere from five to twelve heads.

Monster.Name: Hyena
Monster.Description: A doglike mammal with forelimbs that are longer than the hind limbs and an erect mane.

Monster.Name: Imp
Monster.Description: A vicious, manipulative fiend that compromises the least powerful ranks of the infernal legions that resembles a tiny, red-skinned humanoid with a pair of black wings and a long, scorpion-like tail ending in a poisonous stinger.

Monster.Name: Ixitxachitl
Monster.Description: An aquatic creature that resembles a manta ray.

Monster.Name: Jackal
Monster.Description: A slender, long-legged wild dog that feeds on carrion, game, and fruit and often hunts cooperatively.

Monster.Name: Kenku
Monster.Description: A bird-like, humanoid creature

Monster.Name: Killer Whale
Monster.Description: A large toothed whale with distinctive black-and-white markings and a prominent dorsal fin.

Monster.Name: Kobold
Monster.Description: An aggressive, reptilian, xenophobic, yet industrious small humanoid creature with scaled skin between reddish brown and black in color and burnt orange to red eyes.

Monster.Name: Kraken
Monster.Description: A large, ocean-dwelling magical beast that resembles a large squid.

Monster.Name: Kuo-toa
Monster.Description: A debased monstrous humanoid fish-like race that dwelt in the Underdark.

Monster.Name: Lacedon
Monster.Description: An aquatic type of ghoul.

Monster.Name: Lamia
Monster.Description: A dangerous monstrosity that resembles a beautiful woman from the waist up but has the body of a powerful lion from the waist down.

Monster.Name: Larva
Monster.Description: An entity that is the final remnant of the soul of a mortal corrupted by evil that was unclaimed by fiends via contract or otherwise.

Monster.Name: Lemure
Monster.Description: A hideous creature, appearing as nothing more than a lump of man-sized blobs of molten stinking flesh and a permanent expression of anguish, that oozes across the ground as it moves.

Monster.Name: Lich
Monster.Description: An almost universally evil form of undead spellcaster of great power that appear gaunt and skeletal with withered flesh stretched tight across horribly visible bones.

Monster.Name: Lion
Monster.Description: A large, tawny-colored cat that lives in prides. The male has a flowing shaggy mane.

Monster.Name: Lizard
Monster.Description: A reptile that typically has a long body and tail, four legs, movable eyelids, and a rough, scaly, or spiny skin.

Monster.Name: Lizardfolk
Monster.Description: A lizard-like reptilian humanoid native to Toril.

Monster.Name: Magmin
Monster.Description: A mischievous, nasty little goblin-like elemental creature from the Elemental Plane of fire.

Monster.Name: Mammoth
Monster.Description: A large, hairy elephant with a sloping back and long curved tusks.

Monster.Name: Mane
Monster.Description: A tanar'ri demon that formed out of a chaotic evil soul that has white eyes and pale, bloated flesh that is often in the process of being eaten by maggots.

Monster.Name: Manticore
Monster.Description: A large magical beast with the body of a lion, dragon wings, and a somewhat humanoid head.

Monster.Name: Marid
Monster.Description: A tall, powerful genie native to the Elemental Plane of Water whose skin matched all of the hues of the vast ocean.

Monster.Name: Marilith
Monster.Description: A powerful, six-armed female demon with the lower body of a snake.

Monster.Name: Mastiff
Monster.Description: A dog of a large, strong breed with drooping ears and pendulous lips.

Monster.Name: Medusa
Monster.Description: A monstrous being with a body that is covered in scales and rather than hair, they had a writhing mass of serpents growing from their scalp.

Monster.Name: Merfolk
Monster.Description: An aquatic humanoid who is half human and half fish.

Monster.Name: Merrow
Monster.Description: An undersea merfolk-like monster from the Abyss who terrorized the waters.

Monster.Name: Mezzoloth
Monster.Description: A type of yugoloth that resembles an insect-like humanoid covered in great chitinous plates. They have long, lanky arms and legs with long, sharp claws and wide, armored skulls.

Monster.Name: Mimic
Monster.Description: A creature that is able to change its shape to disguise its body as an inanimate object, commonly a chest. It has a powerful adhesive that holds fast to creatures who touch it, which allow it to beat the creature with its powerful pseudopods.

Monster.Name: Minotaur
Monster.Description: A strong, combative, and monstrous humanoid that resembles a bull–human hybrid.

Monster.Name: Monodrone
Monster.Description: A simple spherical construct with two mechanical arms, two legs, a single eye, and rudimentary wings.

Monster.Name: Mud Mephit
Monster.Description: A mephit composed of water and earth.

Monster.Name: Mule
Monster.Description: An offspring of a donkey and a horse, typically sterile and used as a beast of burden.

Monster.Name: Mummy
Monster.Description: An undead creature created from a preserved corpse that has been animated by the dark gods of the desert.

Monster.Name: Nalfeshnee
Monster.Description: A tall, massive powerful type of demon with small, feathered wings that enable them to fly and back legs which they stand on as a humanoid.

Monster.Name: Nightmare
Monster.Description: An outsider from the Lower Planes which resembles a large black horses with flames wreathing their hooves, flowing forth in the shape of their mane and tail, and trailing from their nostrils and red eyes.

Monster.Name: Nothic
Monster.Description: A one-eyed creeping monster, which is the result of a curse befalling wizards who delved too deep into arcane knowledge, that lurks in places with great magical knowledge.

Monster.Name: Nycaloth
Monster.Description: An elite cavalry soldier in the yugoloth armies that is arrogant, green-skinned, and tall with four muscular arms, a doglike head, and a pair of vast, bat-like wings.

Monster.Name: Octopus
Monster.Description: A cephalopod mollusk with eight sucker-bearing arms, a soft saclike body, strong beaklike jaws, and no internal shell.

Monster.Name: Ogre
Monster.Description: A member of a race of giant-kin that resembles a giant humanoid with a very muscular body and large head.

Monster.Name: Ogrémoch
Monster.Description: A powerful archomental from the Elemental Plane of Earth that resembles a humanoid made of rock and crystal.

Monster.Name: Olhydra
Monster.Description: A powerful archomental from the Elemental Plane of Water and appears as a huge cresting wave with two eyes like large pearls or as a shapeless watery mass.

Monster.Name: Oni
Monster.Description: A violent creature with great strength and inherent magical abilities that resembles a humanoid horse.

Monster.Name: Orc
Monster.Description: A member of a race of humanoids that has grayish skin, coarse hair, stooped postures, low foreheads, large muscular bodies, and porcine faces that featured lower canines that resembled boar tusks.

Monster.Name: Orog
Monster.Description: An orcs who lives and thrives in the Underdark that looks like a normal mountain orc but is slightly taller, with larger ears and huge pale eyes.

Monster.Name: Otyugh
Monster.Description: A strange-looking creature, with bloated, oval-shaped bodies that stood on three shuffling elephantine legs and had a disgusting, rock-like hide.

Monster.Name: Owl
Monster.Description: A nocturnal bird of prey with large forward-facing eyes surrounded by facial disks, a hooked beak, and typically a loud call.

Monster.Name: Owlbear
Monster.Description: A large magical beast that looks like a cross between an owl and a bear.

Monster.Name: Panther
Monster.Description: A leopard, especially a black one, that usually hunts at night.

Monster.Name: Pegasus
Monster.Description: A breed of magical beasts that resemble mere horses with large bird-like wings, feathered lower legs, and feathered manes and tails.

Monster.Name: Pentadrone
Monster.Description: A five-pointed clockwork starfish with one eye on each appendage, on top of five strong mechanical legs, and a tube protruding from the center of the star. They are the most advanced type of base modron.

Monster.Name: Peryton
Monster.Description: A twisted and depraved magical creature that appears to be a cross between a giant eagle and a demonic-looking, fang-toothed stag.

Monster.Name: Piercer
Monster.Description: A worm-like monster that pierces into its victims.

Monster.Name: Pit Fiend
Monster.Description: A bestial, scaled humanoid twice the height of any human being with a pair of wings that it can wrap around its body. They are a general of the baatezu armies.

Monster.Name: Pixie
Monster.Description: A member of a race of sprites native to Faerie that were created by the fey creator race.

Monster.Name: Pixie
Monster.Description: A member of a race of sprites native to Faerie that were created by the fey creator race.

Monster.Name: Planetar
Monster.Description: A member of a race of angels inhabiting the celestial planes that resembles a handsome humanoid creature with blue or green skin and white-feathered wings.

Monster.Name: Planetar
Monster.Description: A member of a race of angels inhabiting the celestial planes that resembles a handsome humanoid creature with blue or green skin and white-feathered wings.

Monster.Name: Plesiosaurus
Monster.Description: A large, marine reptile, with a broad flat body, large paddlelike limbs, and typically a long flexible neck and small head.

Monster.Name: Plesiosaurus
Monster.Description: A large, marine reptile, with a broad flat body, large paddlelike limbs, and typically a long flexible neck and small head.

Monster.Name: Polar Bear
Monster.Description: A large white arctic bear that lives mainly on pack ice. It is a powerful swimmer and feeds chiefly on seals.

Monster.Name: Poltergeist
Monster.Description: A terrifying undead spirit that sends people screaming from the sites they haunt.

Monster.Name: Pony
Monster.Description: A horse of a small breed.

Monster.Name: Pteranodon
Monster.Description: A large tailless pterosaur, with a long toothless beak, a long bony crest, and a wingspan of up to 7 m.

Monster.Name: Quasit
Monster.Description: A tiny humanoid-shaped creature with spiky horns, greenish wart-covered skin, and bat wings.

Monster.Name: Quipper
Monster.Description: A carnivorous fish with sharp teeth.

Monster.Name: Rakshasa
Monster.Description: A type of outsider who is powerfully built humanoid body and an animal's head.

Monster.Name: Rat
Monster.Description: A rodent that resembles a large mouse, typically having a pointed snout and a long, sparsely haired tail.

Monster.Name: Raven
Monster.Description: A large heavily built crow with mainly black plumage, feeding chiefly on carrion.

Monster.Name: Remorhaz
Monster.Description: A blue monstrous beast resembling a cross between a worm and a centipede with tough leathery wings.

Monster.Name: Revenant
Monster.Description: An undead creature that has risen from the dead to hunt down and slay their killer with an unwavering zeal appearing as a decayed and emaciated version of their once-living self.

Monster.Name: Rhinoceros
Monster.Description: A large, heavily built plant-eating mammal with one or two horns on the nose and thick folded skin.

Monster.Name: Roc
Monster.Description: A gargantuan eagle-like bird that inhabits the highest mountains in warm regions.

Monster.Name: Roper
Monster.Description: An ambush hunter that evolved in the underworld and takes the appearance of stalagmites.

Monster.Name: Sahuagin
Monster.Description: A green, fish-like monstrous humanoid that lives in oceans, seas, underground lakes, and underwater caves.

Monster.Name: Salamander
Monster.Description: A newtlike amphibian that typically has bright markings.

Monster.Name: Satyr
Monster.Description: A fey creature that delights in singing, dancing, feasting, and debauchery and appears to be a man with sylvan features from the waist up and goat legs from the waist down.

Monster.Name: Scarecrow
Monster.Description: A scarecrow that has been reanimated by external forces.

Monster.Name: Scorpion
Monster.Description: A terrestrial arachnid with lobsterlike pincers and a poisonous sting at the end of its jointed tail, which it can hold curved over the back.

Monster.Name: Sea Hag
Monster.Description: A wicked, cruel fey creature with an emaciated appearance.

Monster.Name: Sea Horse
Monster.Description: A mythical creature with a horse's head and fish's tail.

Monster.Name: Shadow
Monster.Description: A small marine fish with segmented bony armor, an upright posture, a curled prehensile tail, a tubular snout, and a head and neck suggestive of a horse.

Monster.Name: Shrieker
Monster.Description: A human-sized mushroom that is a variant of the violet fungus known for the strange and loud noises it emitted to attract prey.

Monster.Name: Skeleton
Monster.Description: An undead animated corpse similar to a zombie, but is completely devoid of flesh and does not feed on the living.

Monster.Name: Solar
Monster.Description: A powerfully-built humanoid with flawless skin, beautiful features, and a deep, commanding voice that is a member of the most powerful angels of the angelic choirs.

Monster.Name: Spectator
Monster.Description: An extraplanar form of beholderkin with four eyestalks.

Monster.Name: Specter
Monster.Description: An undead, incorporeal creature that resembles a humanoid with a mostly transparent and faintly luminous form.

Monster.Name: Sprite
Monster.Description: A warrior relative of pixies.

Monster.Name: Sprite
Monster.Description: A warrior relative of pixies.

Monster.Name: Stirge
Monster.Description: A tiny magical beast which resembles a monstrous cross between a large hummingbird and a mosquito that feeds on the blood of other creatures.

Monster.Name: Succubus/Incubus
Monster.Description: A stunningly beautiful demon which appears as a woman/man with flawless skin, raven-black hair, and large bat-like wings mounted on their backs.

Monster.Name: Tarrasque
Monster.Description: An enormous abomination, roughly the size of an ancient dragon, with two long horns extending from its forehead, a thick carapace, mighty tail, and a wide, toothy mouth. If you see this abomination, run for your life!

Monster.Name: Thri-kreen
Monster.Description: A giant, bipedal praying mantis-like humanoid that primarily lives in the Shaar.

Monster.Name: Tiamat
Monster.Description: A unique chromatic dragon, who has one head for each primary color of the most common species of chromatics (black, blue, green, red, and white). Each head is able to operate entirely independent of each other and has the powers of a member of the respective race of dragonkind.

Monster.Name: Tiger
Monster.Description: A very large solitary cat with a yellow-brown coat striped with black.

Monster.Name: Treant
Monster.Description: A huge, intelligent tree-like humanoid.

Monster.Name: Triceratops
Monster.Description: A large quadrupedal herbivorous dinosaur, having a massive head with two large horns, a smaller horn on the beaked snout, and a bony frill above the neck.

Monster.Name: Tridrone
Monster.Description: An intermediate type of modron that is shaped like an inverted tetrahedron and is capable of performing three tasks at a time.

Monster.Name: Troglodyte
Monster.Description: A reptilian humanoid, shorter than a human, with spindly but muscular arms, squat legs, and long, slender tails.

Monster.Name: Troll
Monster.Description: A ravenous, predatory creature of giant-kin that has long, ungainly legs, long hanging arms that end in massive claws, and a thin body with a thick, rubbery hide colored in shades of mossy green or putrid greys.

Monster.Name: Ultroloth
Monster.Description: A faceless humanoid with large eyes that resembles a fire opals and has dark gray skin and typically wears a flowing cape or cloak. They are a strange, enigmatic ruler of the yugoloths.

Monster.Name: Unicorn
Monster.Description: A mysterious and majestic magical beast resembling a horse with a horn protruding from its forehead.

Monster.Name: Vampire
Monster.Description: A pale, red-eyed undead humanoid or monstrous humanoid creature that is the most feared and powerful of the undead creatures.

Monster.Name: Vrock
Monster.Description: A large, gray minor tanar'ri demon that looks like a cross between a vulture and a human.

Monster.Name: Vulture
Monster.Description: A large bird of prey with the head and neck more or less bare of feathers, feeding chiefly on carrion and reputed to gather with others in anticipation of the death of a sick or injured animal or person.

Monster.Name: Warhorse
Monster.Description: A large, powerful horse ridden in battle.

Monster.Name: Weasel
Monster.Description: A small, slender, carnivorous mammal related to, but generally smaller than, the stoat.

Monster.Name: Werebear
Monster.Description: A humanoid that can transform themselves into a large brown bear.

Monster.Name: Wereboar
Monster.Description: A humanoid that can transform themselves into a boar or a hybrid host/boar mix.

Monster.Name: Wererat
Monster.Description: A humanoid that can transform themselves into a rat or a hybrid host/rat mix.

Monster.Name: Weretiger
Monster.Description: A humanoid that can transform themselves into a tiger.

Monster.Name: Werewolf
Monster.Description: A humanoid that can transform themselves into a wolf during a full moon involuntarily.

Monster.Name: Wight
Monster.Description: An undead creature given a semblance of life through sheer violence and hatred appearing as a weird and twisted reflection of the form they had in life.

Monster.Name: Wight
Monster.Description: An undead creature given a semblance of life through sheer violence and hatred appearing as a weird and twisted reflection of the form they had in life.

Monster.Name: Wolf
Monster.Description: A wild carnivorous mammal of the dog family, living and hunting in packs.

Monster.Name: Worg
Monster.Description: A type of magical beast that resembles a normal wolf but is larger, intelligent, and has a fiendish countenance and glowing eyes.

Monster.Name: Wraith
Monster.Description: An undead creature born of evil and darkness, despising light and all living things. Their glowing red eyes are the only visible feature that they possess.

Monster.Name: Wyvern
Monster.Description: A large, dark brown or grey winged lizard with a stinging tail and sharp teeth.

Monster.Name: Xorn
Monster.Description: A very strange elemental creature from the Plane of Earth who has a radially symmetrical body with a large mouth at the top and is surrounded by three long arms with talons at the end interspersed with their three eyes. Their wide, pebbly, and rocky bodies rested upon three stumpy legs.

Monster.Name: Yan-C-Bin
Monster.Description: A tall, thin, elderly humanoid with long hair flowing in the wind who is powerful archomental from the Elemental Plane of Air.

Monster.Name: Yeti
Monster.Description: A large, white-furred creature that can be found in arctic climates and appears as a cross between a human and a bear that is walking upright.

Monster.Name: Yochlol
Monster.Description: A type of lesser tanar'ri demon that served as a "handmaiden" to Lolth, the drow goddess of chaos. They appear as a six-foot-tall, eight-tentacled blob of melted wax that continually emits a foul stench, but they can change into either a humanoid, spider, ooze, or gaseous.

Monster.Name: Zombie
Monster.Description: An undead creature usually created by the re-animation of a corpse.
